item.description:
Their Back!!!!

Listen Here! Short Story Reading Series

Join us for tonight’s Listen Here! Short Story Reading Event

Story Theme"
What Did She See in Him?
Raymond Carver, “Fat”
F. Scott Fitzgerald, “The Jelly-Bean”

New Haven Theater Company is teaming up with The Arts Council of Greater New Haven, the New Haven Review and four area coffeehouses, are pleased to announce the launch of Listen Here!, a weekly series in which New Haven Theater Company actors read short stories selected by New Haven Review editors. Readings will take place on a rotating basis at Bru (on Orange Street in Pitkin Plaza), Willoughby’s (on York St. under the Architecture School), Lulu: A European Coffeehouse, and Manjares Fine Pastries in Westville. Readings are Tuesdays at 7 p.m.!


Free, but you will need the usual amount for beverages and food.
Get there early to order coffee and food ahead of time.
